title: GameTicket
name: GameTicket
description: This is an example of a GameTicket

Success 200.description: The game ticket to be parsed by the client.

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: Get open ticket
name: GetOldTicket
description: This endpoint is called when the user wants to retrieve an old ticket probably under instructions from the SocketsServer.

examples.title: Error-Response:

Success 200.description: The game ticket to be parsed by the client.

title: Request Game Ticket
name: GetTicket
description: This endpoint is called when the user requests to play a new game. Initial check has happened in the client about cost deductions. But this process is responsible to actual make them happen after all other processes have concluded.

Parameter.description: The game type name of the game ticket.

examples.title: Error-Response:

Success 200.description: The game ticket to be parsed by the client.

Parameter.description: tokens The tokens list for the devices to push the message
